com.stormpath.sdk.application
Interface ApplicationOptions<T>

All Superinterfaces:
AccountStoreOptions<T>, Options
All Known Subinterfaces:
ApplicationCriteria
public interface ApplicationOptions<T>
extends AccountStoreOptions<T>

Application-specific options that may be specified when retrieving Application resources.

Since:
0.8

Method Detail

withAccountStoreMappings

T withAccountStoreMappings()
Ensures that when retrieving the resource, its associated accountStoreMappings are also retrieved in the same request (paginated). This enhances performance by leveraging a single request to retrieve multiple related resources you know you will use.

If you wish to control pagination parameters (offset and limit) for the returned accountStoreMappings, see the withAccountStoreMappings(limit) or withAccountStoreMappings(limit,offset) methods.

Returns:
this instance for method chaining.

withAccountStoreMappings

T withAccountStoreMappings(int limit)
Ensures that when retrieving the resource, its associated accountStoreMappings are also retrieved in the same request (paginated), limiting the first page of AccountStoreMapping results to limit items. This enhances performance by leveraging a single request to retrieve multiple related resources you know you will use.

Parameters:
limit - the number of results in the AccountStoreMappings collection's first page. Min: 1, Max: 100.
Returns:
this instance for method chaining.

withAccountStoreMappings

T withAccountStoreMappings(int limit,
                           int offset)
Ensures that when retrieving the resource, its associated accountStoreMappings are also retrieved in the same request (paginated) , with the first page of AccountStoreMapping results starting at the specified offset index and limiting the number of results to limit items. This enhances performance by leveraging a single request to retrieve multiple related resources you know you will use.

Parameters:
limit - the number of results in the AccountStoreMapping collection's first page. Min: 1, Max: 100.
offset - the starting index of the first AccountStoreMapping to retrieve in the overall AccountStoreMapping collection's result set.
Returns:
this instance for method chaining.
